page.title: 01GENERAL INTRODUCTION
page.content:
This area represents a great variety of lifestyle within a small area. It consists of the region south of Dartford Parish Church, the villages of Wilmington and Hawley and surrounding farmland, heath and parkland. The dominant features of the area are the roads, especially the A.2.(T) and the M.25 which meet at an important intersection within this area. This provides links with the north of England through the Dartford Tunnel and south to Dover and the Continent.
Much of the area lies within the Green Belt and so the natural beauty remains in many parts, giving residents of Dartford and the villages the opportunity of a breath of fresh air not too far from home.
